text: Barley is a member of the grass family of plants. Its seeds are a cereal grain. It is a staple food of humans and other animals, and it is one of mankind's oldest crops. It can be made into flour or beer. Its Latin name is Hordeum vulgare. Barley is an annual plant. ==Production== The world's biggest barley producers (2007) Rank Country quantity (in t) rank Country quantity (in t) 1 15.663.110 9 5.149.000 2 11.822.100 10 4.611.940 3 11.684.000 11 4.065.800 4 11.034.200 12 3.851.000 5 9.472.000 13 3.104.200 6 7.423.000 14 3.000.000 7 6.000.000 15 2.600.000 8 5.920.000 World 136.207.179 Source: Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations (FAO) Source: Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations (FAO) ==References== Category:Grains
